p: SARS-CoV-2 CNS manifestation befalls in approximately 25% of the cases. Further, the recent onset of seizures reported as a manifestation of SARS-CoV-2 encephalitis and meningitis. They are associated with confusion and loss of consciousness and meningeal irritation signs, while MRI revealed hyperintensities lesions. Further, there are reports on the diagnosis confirmation by positive CSF RT-PCR rather than a nasopharyngeal swab [52], [53], [54], [55].
